reqs: If this course is blocked to registration it is because it is full. Please register in the waiting list section of the course (CNRS 370 WL1). If and when a space in the course becomes available, students will be automatically transferred "in order" from the wait list. Please do not contact the Department office as we are unable to make exceptions to this system.
description: Origins, nature, and transmission of myth in the Western tradition, with particular attention devoted to the interpretation of myth from ancient times up to the present. Some background in myth is recommended.
